definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: If do not think company of outfit allowing the home is made, buy off-the-peg cloakroom pretty good also.
sentences.chinese: 假如不想讓家裝公司製作，買現成的衣帽間也不錯。

sentences.english: It is no doubt a pleasant thing to have a library left you.
sentences.chinese: 有個現成的書樓遺贈給你，那無疑是一樁快事。

sentences.english: On the way we were given readymade gin and tonics.
sentences.chinese: 在去的路上，我們喝了現成的琴湯尼酒。

sentences.english: But click it, you can discover to there is off-the-peg answer on the webpage.
sentences.chinese: 但點擊它，你會發現網頁上並沒有現成的答案。

sentences.english: In a sign of the times, one carpentry shop now sells ready-made coffins.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時代改變，有一家木材店現在也買現成的棺材。

sentences.english: People like Li Mei-t' ing , who had been teaching for years, had ready-made lecture notes.
sentences.chinese: 不過李梅亭這些人都是教授有年，有現成講義的。

sentences.english: Make sure there's a ready market before you start stocking your goods.
sentences.chinese: 備貨前，確保你有一個現成的市場。

sentences.english: It also needs systems in place and a disciplined workforce.
sentences.chinese: 它還需要有現成的制度和訓練有素的勞動隊伍。

sentences.english: SkimWoodFilla is a ready-mixed water-based fast drying interior filler for furniture covering grains and holes on wood surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 實堅木器補泥是一種快乾現成混合水性木器填料。

sentences.english: The manufacturer had an existing table with the depot polygons already defined.
sentences.chinese: 製造商有一個已經定義了維修站多邊形的現成的表。

sentences.english: They buy things alread made at he shops .
sentences.chinese: 他們從商店裏買來現成的東西。

sentences.english: I just want to buy some off-the-rack clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我只想買一些現成的衣服。

sentences.english: "Schema" that in Chinese traditional art, what to point is a ready-made shape mold originally.
sentences.chinese: 中國傳統藝術中的“圖式”，指的是現成的造型模本。

sentences.english: Separate cutting boards must be used for raw and ready-to-eat foods.
sentences.chinese: 未經烹煮的食品和現成食品應該各有不同的砧板。

sentences.english: I had no convenient cicerone in the pattern of the Utopian books.
sentences.chinese: 我在烏托邦的書裏沒有找到現成模式的指導思想。

sentences.english: I don't know how ready-to-wear or couture designers can make a go of it.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道如何現成的服裝或時裝設計師可以下來了。

definition: as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
convenient/handy/easy/bento (a meal in a partitioned box)/lunchbox
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
